segments.text: As I observe the scene, I feel a sense of disbelief at the woman’s ignorance of the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see the water gathering around her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch as the boy stretches precariously toward the cookie jar, his face lit with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, her hand outstretched, filled with eagerness and hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there’s a part of me that worries; the stool is tilting, and one wrong move could spell disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like the calmness of the kitchen doesn’t match the tension building up in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Seeing the garden outside through the window just emphasizes how chaotic this moment really is.
segments.speaker: PAR
